system.description:
The user changes Forme. Passive: The user changes from its Sky Forme to its Land Forme if Thunderstorm, Hailstorm, Umbra, Enshrouded, or Radstorm Weathers (and their Tier 3 variants) are present. The user may freely change Formes as a Downtime Action. When in Sky Forme, the user gains [Winged], Flight 19 Movement Primary Movment, and +20 to its Running Skill. Depending on its Forme, it gains two Abilities:
- Land Forme - Natural Cure, Harvest
- Sky Forme - Serene Grace, Wind Rider
